text: Sadly, this place has long lost its glory. Who still remembers coming here for sake sushi back in 1999? There used to be sneaker shops bustling with people checking out the latest shoes. Push carts back then was in trend too. Unfortunately, it is what it is. ðŸ¥¹
Sleepy mall tucked away in Orchard Road shopping district. Has a 24h McDonaldâ€™s outlet and an outdoor Starbucks just outside the main door entrance.

A shell of it's former self. Most shops are empty. Got indoor playground. Got McDonald's.

Overall if u want peace and not too crowded to watch a movie this is a gd place. However really nothing much to see or shop here.

Security is very on the ball! Within 10 minutes was accosted for parking in a disabled spot. Good job to make sure that only those with valid permits should be parking there! Really appreciate that.

If only they checked first if the vehicles had an actual permit before the threats!

Cineleisure is a wonderful mall and the biggest decathlon in SG is here it has many things there like Tiong Bahru bakery and din tai Fung ðŸ¤©. I go here regularly and love it so much.But one thing is that din tai Fung gets crowded quickly.
